nodes.definition: Process of arranging elements in a specific order

nodes.text: Bubble sort is a simple sorting algorithm that repeatedly steps through the list
def bubble_sort(arr): for i in range(len(arr)): for j in range(0, len(arr)-i-1): ...
nodes.definition: Implementation of bubble sort in Python

nodes.text: Implement an optimized version of bubble sort that stops early if no swaps occur
